title: why do people say jax is "hard to itemize against"
body: meanwhile darius has armor pen from his kit and the black cleaver while jax does medicore mixed damage with no penetration

replies.body: I'm sorry but did you just say Jax has mediocre damage?

> [{quoted}](name=I Win Haha,realm=NA,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=QUBkEMR0,comment-id=,timestamp=2016-09-09T23:51:13.578+0000)
>
> medicore mixed damage 

You can't put "mediocre" and "damage" in the same sentence when talking about jax
